TopicTitle: Taking a stock SSTO way out past Jool to visit Sarnus and its moons

Articles.Content:
This was easily the farthest I have ever taken an SSTO and, due to the number of consecutive gravity assists involved, one of the hardest things I have ever done in KSP - complete with a runway landing! It was also one of the few missions I have done that actually involved doing some maths beforehand . Working out how to go about the slingshots took a very long time but at least it was worth it in the end.

Enjoy!
